proposal: Diving into the world of sales with Rilla feels like having a GPS for conversations, guiding every turn towards closing deals. With 17 holders in the ETH network, imagine integrating our B2B tools to further empower your community, not just your team. From creating a DEX for revenue sharing to deploying a lottery everyone can enjoy, we're here to add another layer to your coaching toolkit. Let's make every sales journey a roadmap to success.
